definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: The kite is my dearest parents.
sentences.chinese: 放风筝的人便是我至亲至爱的双亲。

sentences.english: We are ascending beloveds and do not wish to be apart.
sentences.chinese: 我们是提升的至爱而不希望分离。

sentences.english: You might get your heart broken 10 times, but find themost wonderful woman the 11th time.
sentences.chinese: 你或许心碎了10次，但是在第十一次找到至爱。

sentences.english: You think your loved one could benefit from talking to a mental healthprofessional.
sentences.chinese: 你认为你的至爱同精神健康专家交谈可以受益。

sentences.english: Mr. Kang Binghua, General Manager of Shanghai HV Express.
sentences.chinese: 康炳华，上海天女至爱饰品有限公司总经理。

sentences.english: I would rather have the affectionate regard of my fellow men than I would have heaps and mines of gold.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿得到人们的深情至爱，而不愿黄金成雄。

sentences.english: Let us say that you desire to manifest of the beloved.
sentences.chinese: 让我们说，你渴望显化一名至爱者。

sentences.english: So put your pen to paper and pour your feelings out for the love of your life.
sentences.chinese: 所以，拿起笔，倾吐你对至爱的情意吧。

sentences.english: Money is another favourite subject of gangsta rappers .
sentences.chinese: 钱也是黑帮说唱歌手的另一至爱话题。

sentences.english: The risks can persist even after the loved one dies.
sentences.chinese: 这种几率甚至会在至爱的一方死去之后一直持续。

definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
